events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further consideration.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will reach out to you regarding the next steps soon.
The initial screening call went well, and we discussed your experience with backend development in detail.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate the feedback and look forward to the next interview stage.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 10 AM UTC with our senior engineering team.
The technical interview was successfully completed, with positive feedback on problem-solving skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 23rd at 3 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview was completed successfully and the recruiter will be in touch soon regarding an offer.
We are pleased to offer you the software engineer position. Please review the attached offer letter carefully.
I have reviewed the offer and am excited to accept it. Thank you for this opportunity.
The candidate has officially accepted the job offer and looks forward to starting with the team.
Onboarding has started with orientation sessions scheduled and access to company resources granted.
The hiring process is now complete successfully, and the candidate has joined the engineering department.
